name: Irresistible
description:
You are the last attractive man on earth and must fend off all of your adoring fans! Don't worry, you won't be killing them. Instead, you will need to distract them with items that suit their taste more than you!

Controls:

A - Blue

S - Red

D - Green

Space - Shoot

Final Boss  ?????

Wish I had had time to implement sound...sorry everyone.

Made for Kenny Jam 2017
